source.name: GSA PBS Environmental Risk Index (ERIN)
source.description:
ERIN is a measure of the environmental and health risk presented by PBS facilities. It is designed to serve as a prima facie indicator of the overall environmental performance of each building. ERIN is not a comprehensive environmental compliance review, nor is it a measure of an asset's "greenness". Fourteen risk categories are addressed in the ERI. These are listed below in priority order: 

1.Hazardous Waste
2.Asbestos
3.Indoor Air Quality
4.Hazardous Materials
5.Subsurface Contamination
6.Lead
7.PCB
8.Storage Tanks
9.Air/Ozone
10.Drinking Water (PBS provided)
11.Drinking Water (Utility provided)
12.Wastewater
13.Radon
14.Stormwater
